mapper.select: SELECT * FROM db_examination.test ORDER BY id
mapper.update: UPDATE db_examination.test SET type = #{type}, question = #{question}, optionA = #{optionA}, optionB = #{optionB}, optionC = #{optionC}, optionD = #{optionD}, answer = #{answer}, paperId = #{paperId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO db_examination.test ( type, question, optionA, optionB, optionC, optionD, answer, paperId ) VALUES ( #{type}, #{question}, #{optionA}, #{optionB}, #{optionC}, #{optionD}, #{answer}, #{paperId} );
